meta.title: FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions | Englistry
meta.description: Find answers to common questions about our English learning platform, test features, technical requirements, and more.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about our English learning platform, test features, and more.

what-is-englistry.question: What is Englistry?
what-is-englistry.answer: Englistry is a comprehensive English proficiency testing platform designed to assess your English language skills through various question types including reading comprehension, grammar, vocabulary, and cloze tests. Our platform provides immediate feedback and detailed results to help you understand your current English level.

how-to-start.question: How do I start taking a test?
how-to-start.answer: Simply visit our homepage and click the 'Start Test' button. No registration is required for basic tests. The system will automatically load available question groups and create a personalized test experience for you.

is-free.question: Is the platform free to use?
is-free.answer: Yes, our basic English proficiency test is completely free to use. You can take the test multiple times and access your results without any cost. We believe in making quality English assessment accessible to everyone.

test-duration.question: How long does the test take?
test-duration.answer: The test typically takes 30-45 minutes to complete, depending on the number of questions and your reading speed. You can see your progress throughout the test, and there's a timer to help you manage your time effectively.

test-types.question: What types of questions are included?
test-types.answer: Our tests include various question types: Reading Comprehension (understanding written English texts), Grammar & Vocabulary (testing your knowledge of English grammar rules and vocabulary), Cloze Tests (fill-in-the-blank exercises to test contextual understanding), and Multiple Choice (various topics with multiple answer options).

test-results.question: How are test results calculated?
test-results.answer: Your results are calculated based on the number of correct answers, question difficulty, and time taken. You'll receive a detailed breakdown showing your performance in different areas like grammar, vocabulary, and reading comprehension. Results are available immediately after completing the test.

retake-test.question: Can I retake the test?
retake-test.answer: Yes, you can retake the test as many times as you want. Each test session may include different questions to ensure a fair assessment. We recommend waiting at least a few days between attempts to allow for learning and improvement.

browser-requirements.question: What browsers are supported?
browser-requirements.answer: Our platform works on all modern browsers including Chrome (recommended), Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend using the latest version of your browser for the best experience. JavaScript must be enabled for the platform to function properly.

mobile-support.question: Can I take the test on my mobile device?
mobile-support.answer: Yes, our platform is fully responsive and works well on mobile devices and tablets. However, for the best testing experience, we recommend using a desktop or laptop computer with a stable internet connection.

technical-issues.question: What should I do if I encounter technical issues?
technical-issues.answer: If you experience technical problems, try these steps: 1) Refresh the page and try again, 2) Clear your browser cache and cookies, 3) Try using a different browser, 4) Check your internet connection, 5) Disable browser extensions that might interfere. If problems persist, please contact us through our contact page with details about the issue and your browser information.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our subscription plans

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period, and you won't be charged again.

items.question: Do you offer refunds?
items.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your subscription, contact us within 30 days for a full refund.

items.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, while downgrades apply at your next billing cycle.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through our trusted payment partners.

items.question: Is there a free trial for premium features?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a 7-day free trial for all premium plans so you can experience the full benefits before committing.

items.question: What happens if I miss a payment?
items.answer: We'll notify you if there's an issue with your payment. You'll have a grace period to update your payment information before your access is temporarily suspended.
